RateAggregator.mainSelect: SELECT /*+ ORDERED FULL(i) FULL(a) FULL(d) USE_HASH(v d a b) */ v.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr , --0 v.cpod, --1 a.Operando, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(v.cdsti, 'YYYYMMDD') < '20080401' THEN '20080401' ELSE TO_CHAR(v.cdsti, 'YYYYMMDD') END AS ab, --3 TO_CHAR(v.cdces, 'YYYYMMDD') AS bis, CASE WHEN b.Operando = 'ER000VENDT' THEN 'E005_CCA' WHEN b.operando = 'ER100PERDT' THEN 'E100_PER' WHEN b.operando = 'ER102_PTRA' THEN 'E240_MSP' WHEN b.operando = 'ER120_PCV' THEN 'E121_COV' WHEN b.operando = 'ER125_PPE' THEN 'E125_PPE' WHEN b.operando = 'ER126_UC1' THEN 'E126_UC1' WHEN b.operando = 'ER180PDIM' THEN 'E180PDIM' WHEN b.operando = 'ER200_DISP' THEN 'E202_GRT' WHEN b.operando = 'ER210_ODS' THEN 'E210_ODS' WHEN b.operando = 'ER220_VE' THEN 'E100_PER' WHEN b.operando = 'ER221_DP' THEN 'E221_DP' WHEN b.operando = 'ER222_INT' THEN 'E222_INT' WHEN b.operando = 'ER223_CD' THEN 'E223_CD' WHEN b.operando = 'ER225_OD' THEN 'E225_OD' WHEN b.operando = 'ER240_MSP' THEN 'E240_MSP' WHEN b.operando = 'ER250_DBT' THEN 'E250_DBT' WHEN b.operando = 'ER310_PCON' THEN 'E310PCOI' WHEN b.operando = 'ER311_PL1' THEN 'E311PL1I' WHEN b.operando = 'ER91_IMP' AND v.Ctfor = 'Utenza di illuminazione pubblica' THEN 'E91E_L01' WHEN b.operando = 'ER91_IMP' AND v.Ctfor = 'Utenza residenziale' THEN 'E91I_UD' WHEN b.operando = 'ER91_IMP' AND v.Ctfor = 'Utenza di altro tipo' THEN 'E91S_M04' WHEN b.operando = 'ER60DISTR' AND v.Ctfor = 'Utenza residenziale' THEN 'E610DSUD' WHEN b.operando = 'ER60DISTR' AND v.Ctfor != 'Utenza residenziale' THEN 'E620DAUI' ELSE a.valori END AS tarif , --5 z.KONDIGR, b.Id_Operando FROM z_Test_Contratti i , Dbi_User.Ifc_Sap_Anagrcontrele v , Dbi_User.Ifc_Sap_Punti_Fornitura d , z_Prodotto_Operando a , z_Anagrafica_Operandi b , Dbi_User.Ifc_Sap_Anagrindirizzi_pr g , v_Indirizzi l, z_zmda_instln z,instln_data e WHERE i.Note = 'lotto 40' AND v.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr = i.Cncon --AND v.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr = 'PR2011209' AND v.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr=g.pr AND a.Acquisizione = v.Cfreq AND a.Ctar1 = v.Ctar1 and v.cpod=e.legacy AND a.Operando = b.Operando --AND a.operando not in ('ER60DISTR','ER91_IMP') AND a.Operando = z.Operand AND b.Tipo = 'RATE TYPE' AND d.Dbi_Punto_Key = v.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr AND d.valid_from=v.d_valido_dal AND d.valid_until=v.d_valido_al AND d.Frequenza_Misura = v.Cfreq and TO_CHAR(v.cdsti, 'YYYYMMDD')>= e.ab and v.cpod=e.legacy AND l.Indprog = g.Indprog AND z.operand = a.Operando AND ( z.OPZ_DISTR = d.Cd_Tariffa_Distr_norm OR z.OPZ_DISTR IS NULL) AND z.TIPO_USO = Dec_Stagruver(v.Ctfor) AND z.LIV_TENS = Dec_Spebene(v.Crete,d.Tensione) AND ( z.RESIDENZA = DEC_CTFOR(v.CTFOR) OR z.RESIDENZA IS NULL) AND ( z.PROVINCIA = l.Indprov OR z.PROVINCIA IS NULL) --AND (z.CD_ISTAT = l.Indccom or z.CD_ISTAT is null) AND TRIM(TO_CHAR(d.potenza_impegnata)) BETWEEN z.POTENZA_DA AND z.POTENZA_A GROUP BY v.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr , --0 v.cpod, --1 a.Operando, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(v.cdsti, 'YYYYMMDD') < '20080401' THEN '20080401' ELSE TO_CHAR(v.cdsti, 'YYYYMMDD') END , TO_CHAR(v.cdces, 'YYYYMMDD'), CASE WHEN b.Operando = 'ER000VENDT' THEN 'E005_CCA' WHEN b.operando = 'ER100PERDT' THEN 'E100_PER' WHEN b.operando = 'ER102_PTRA' THEN 'E240_MSP' WHEN b.operando = 'ER120_PCV' THEN 'E121_COV' WHEN b.operando = 'ER125_PPE' THEN 'E125_PPE' WHEN b.operando = 'ER126_UC1' THEN 'E126_UC1' WHEN b.operando = 'ER180PDIM' THEN 'E180PDIM' WHEN b.operando = 'ER200_DISP' THEN 'E202_GRT' WHEN b.operando = 'ER210_ODS' THEN 'E210_ODS' WHEN b.operando = 'ER220_VE' THEN 'E100_PER' WHEN b.operando = 'ER221_DP' THEN 'E221_DP' WHEN b.operando = 'ER222_INT' THEN 'E222_INT' WHEN b.operando = 'ER223_CD' THEN 'E223_CD' WHEN b.operando = 'ER225_OD' THEN 'E225_OD' WHEN b.operando = 'ER240_MSP' THEN 'E240_MSP' WHEN b.operando = 'ER250_DBT' THEN 'E250_DBT' WHEN b.operando = 'ER310_PCON' THEN 'E310PCOI' WHEN b.operando = 'ER311_PL1' THEN 'E311PL1I' WHEN b.operando = 'ER91_IMP' AND v.Ctfor = 'Utenza di illuminazione pubblica' THEN 'E91E_L01' WHEN b.operando = 'ER91_IMP' AND v.Ctfor = 'Utenza residenziale' THEN 'E91I_UD' WHEN b.operando = 'ER91_IMP' AND v.Ctfor = 'Utenza di altro tipo' THEN 'E91S_M04' WHEN b.operando = 'ER60DISTR' AND v.Ctfor = 'Utenza residenziale' THEN 'E610DSUD' WHEN b.operando = 'ER60DISTR' AND v.Ctfor != 'Utenza residenziale' THEN 'E620DAUI' ELSE a.valori END, z.kondigr, b.Id_Operando

RateExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT FACTS_KEY.LEGACY||facts_f_rate_type.operand||facts_v_rate_type.ab, --0 FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 facts_f_rate_type.legacy||facts_f_rate_type.operand||facts_v_rate_type.ab, --4 facts_f_rate_type.tipo, --5 facts_f_rate_type.operand, --6 facts_f_rate_type.saison, --7 facts_f_rate_type.prog, --8 facts_v_rate_type.legacy||facts_f_rate_type.operand||facts_v_rate_type.ab, --9 facts_v_rate_type.tipo, --10 facts_v_rate_type.ab, --11 facts_v_rate_type.bis, --12 facts_v_rate_type.tarifart, --13 facts_v_rate_type.kondigr, --14 facts_v_rate_type.prog --15 from facts_key,facts_f_rate_type,facts_v_rate_type where facts_key.legacy = facts_f_rate_type.legacy and facts_v_rate_type.legacy=facts_key.legacy and facts_f_rate_type.legacy=facts_v_rate_type.legacy and facts_f_rate_type.prog=facts_v_rate_type.prog order by facts_f_rate_type.prog
